瞭.definition: to watch from a height or distance

瞭哨.definition: to go on sentry duty; to stand guard

瞭如指掌.definition: variant of 了如指掌[liao3 ru2 zhi3 zhang3]

瞭望.definition: to watch from a height or distance; to keep a lookout

瞭若指掌.definition: see 了如指掌[liao3 ru2 zhi3 zhang3]

瞭解.definition: to understand; to realize; to find out
